attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, returns an error on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, returns an error on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, returns an error on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation: @dev add a and b and then subtract c
attributes.name: addThenSub

attributes.documentation:
@dev `error` corresponds to enum Error; `info` corresponds to enum FailureInfo, and `detail` is an arbitrary
contract-specific code that enables us to report opaque error codes from upgradeable contracts.*
attributes.name: Failure

attributes.documentation: @dev use this when reporting a known error from the money market or a non-upgradeable collaborator
attributes.name: fail

attributes.documentation: @dev use this when reporting an opaque error from an upgradeable collaborator contract
attributes.name: failOpaque
getExp

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two exponentials, returning a new exponential.
attributes.name: addExp

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two exponentials, returning a new exponential.
attributes.name: subExp

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiply an Exp by a scalar, returning a new Exp.
attributes.name: mulScalar

attributes.documentation: @dev Divide an Exp by a scalar, returning a new Exp.
attributes.name: divScalar

attributes.documentation: @dev Divide a scalar by an Exp, returning a new Exp.
attributes.name: divScalarByExp

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two exponentials, returning a new exponential.
attributes.name: mulExp
divExp

attributes.documentation:
@dev Truncates the given exp to a whole number value.
     For example, truncate(Exp{mantissa: 15 * (10**18)}) = 15
attributes.name: truncate

attributes.documentation: @dev Checks if first Exp is less than second Exp.
attributes.name: lessThanExp

attributes.documentation: @dev Checks if left Exp <= right Exp.
attributes.name: lessThanOrEqualExp

attributes.documentation: @dev Checks if first Exp is greater than second Exp.
attributes.name: greaterThanExp

attributes.documentation: @dev returns true if Exp is exactly zero
attributes.name: isZeroExp
